products.name: Mdify
products.description: Convert any article to clean .md for AI agents
products.sampleTweet: Stop pasting bloated links. Use #Mdify to convert posts to clean .md for your AI agent.
products.redditPost:
Mdify - Convert any article to clean Markdown for AI agents

I've been using this Chrome extension and it's been a game changer for my AI workflows. No more messy copy-paste, just clean .md files ready for any AI agent to process.

Anyone else using tools like this?

products.name: Guardskills
products.description: Scan AI skills for malicious code before installing
products.sampleTweet: Stop risking your keys. Use @guardskills_ to scan AI skills for malicious code. Security matters.
products.redditPost:
Guardskills - Security scanner for AI skills

Worried about malicious AI skills? This NPM package scans AI skills for malicious code before you install them. Protect your API keys and your AI workflows.

Has anyone tried this yet?
